Asgarnian hops are a Farming plant grown at level 8 Farming. Asgarnian hops are grown by planting 4 asgarnian seeds in a hops patch using a seed dibber.

After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become Asgarnian hops. The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the hops at the cost of a sack of onions.

Asgarnian hops take 50 minutes to mature. An amulet of nature may be bound to the patch to provide progress on its growth. Once mature, the hops produces up to 35 Asgarnian hops at a time without compost and 65 with ultracompost.

Planting the asgarnian hops seeds gives 10.9 farming experience. No xp is given for checking on the hops. If the farmer does not watch the hops path, then disease on the patch may be removed using plant cure. However, if left alone, the diseased patch will die.

Each hop, when picked, gives 12 farming experience. The hops do not grow back after they are picked. The hops may be picked after the plant is completely grown.

'''Asgarnian hops''' are a [[Farming]] plant grown at level 8 Farming. Asgarnian hops are grown by planting 4 [[asgarnian seed]]s in a [[hops patch]] using a [[seed dibber]].

After 10 minutes or less, the planted seed will become [[Asgarnian hops]]. The hops patch must be raked clean of weeds. Once planted, the nearby farmer may be paid to watch over the hops at the cost of a [[sack of onions]]. 

Asgarnian hops take 50 minutes to mature. An [[amulet of nature]] may be bound to the patch to provide progress on its growth. Once mature, the hops produces up to 35 [[Asgarnian hops]] at a time without compost and 65 with ultracompost.

Planting the asgarnian hops seeds gives 10.9 farming experience. No xp is given for checking on the hops. If the farmer does not watch the hops path, then disease on the patch may be removed using [[plant cure]]. However, if left alone, the diseased patch will die.

Each hop, when picked, gives 12 farming experience. The hops do not grow back after they are picked. The hops may be picked after the plant is completely grown.
